commit message: First commit
initial stuff done
Can pull data from rainwave.cc, but currently on UI thread
Cleaning up imports and misleading comments
Fetching of now playing info moved to separate thread
Made important data types into Parcelables and moved fetching album art to the background.
Added preferences
Session object loads from a Context, accessing the preferences for a user_id and key
Long-polling implemented, small UI change as well.
Some improvements with AsyncTask management
Better error handling, merged two asynctasks into the same ones
Refactored the error handling into a more Java-like exception
Removed artifact from last commit
Force Session to be initialized in onResume()
Some layout elements added for ratings
Ratings show up in NowPlayingActivity
Rating songs is now possible.
Proper rating error handling, plus using the response to update the UI
Some commenting done
Displaying election data successfully
Wrote CountdownView, inserted it at various places throughout the app.
Voting animation added
Voting works in the really special way that I want it to. Special in the way that I'm a special person.
Error messages are displaying now
Minor bug where once a countdown has finished and a vote was cast unsuccessfully, if the user voted again it would try to vote instantly with no countdown.
Marking this version as 0.1
Fixed where API keys couldnt be entered properly
Better detection of being tuned in or not
adding ant build files
Merge branch 'master' of github.com:OEP/rainwave-android
adding default.properties
final build.xml who knows...
Started using the default deserializer due to new rainwave response format
Now properly sees if we have voted on a song before
Fixed up for automagic builds
Some refinement on reporting errors.
Refresh menu item added as well as a throbber indicator at the title bar
Dialog will pick station to listen to
Properly remembers which station you last listened to and displays current station in title bar.
Marking this as RC2
Station discovery possibly working fine.
Did a little refactoring of packages
Fixed a bug where getStationName() would cause a NullPtr Exception when NowPlayingActivity would perform an update. As well, made the Station picker a little more descriptive.
Tuning in is possible assuming theres an app that can handle it on the users phone.
Song now fit to receive elec_isrequest
added UI hooks for showing who requested stuff
Song countdowns are working...
Vote rushing (voting when theres no time) works
Added a nifty new icon
Marking this one for release
